title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1154.6 - Unauthorized use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1154.6 - Unauthorized use

State Regulations

No person shall use or occupy an operational area for any
purpose whatsoever except for an approved purpose pertaining to the servicing
of tenants, concessionaires, airlines, activities associated with airlines, bus
terminals or associated activities, warehouses and stevedoring operations, or
governmental agencies, or a purpose connected with maintenance and operation of
a terminal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1154.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
